sentence.Network_en: That worthy had his future fixed for him beyond a peradventure.
sentence.Network_cn: 无疑,这位可敬的先生将做的事,造物主早就安排好了.

sentence.Network_en: Peradventure, hadst thou met earlier with a better love than mine, this evil had not been.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你早些得到强过于我的爱, 这件邪恶就不会发生了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: per 每peradventure 或者perambulate 巡行
peracute 过急的, peradventure 不料, peradon 佩拉东
peradventure 站在, peradventure 货栈, peradventure 紧急
peradventure 甜水, peradventure 站在, peradventure 疑问

list.abs: This proves beyond peradventure that he is innocent ., 这些毫无疑问地证明他是无辜的.
If peradventure you meet him ., 要是你碰巧遇到他.
...沪江词库精选without peradventure是什么意思、英语短语。without peradventure的意思： 无疑地, 毫无问题地相关短语：
in meekness instructing those that oppose themselves ; if God peradventure will give them repentance to the acknowledging of the truth ;25用温柔劝戒那抵挡的人；或者神给他们悔改的心，可以明白真道。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French per (or par) auenture 'by chance'

sentences.sentence: "we may possibly run into them at the concert"
"it may peradventure be thought that there never was such a time"

auth_sentence.content: To each mortal peradventure earth becomes a new machine.
auth_sentence.res_content: To each mortal peradventure earth becomes a new machine.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To each mortal peradventure earth becomes a new machine.

auth_sentence.content: Unless, peradventure, their wives were comely.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Unless, peradventure, their wives were comely.
